title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: The late Dr Chalmers and theRev. Mr Shaw of Langholm were great friends,having been fellow-collegians and both from the"kingdom of Fife;" the former being the assistantat Cavers and the latter at Roberton, within a fewmiles of which they had many a meeting and merrymaking together.
